quest.name: The Crystarium's Resolve
journal: The Exarch is eager to delve into the details of his proposal.
objectives: Drink the vial of prince's kiss before Chessamile.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let us hear what the Exarch has to say.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Entrust Minfilia's rescue to the people of the Crystarium? All right, then...

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Many here have a place in their heart for Minfilia. We must ensure this mission succeeds─for all of their sakes.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Though our hosts have offered to take the lead, we still have a part to play. Let's see that we play it well.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The people of the Crystarium have initiative. I respect that.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: So, you will be joining the guard. But however highly the Exarch thinks of you, you will receive no special treatment from me. Is that clear?

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Where's your salute, soldier!?

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Better. More spirited than the Exarch's feeble attempts, certainly.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Now, first things first: you will need uniforms.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Go to the Crystalline Mean and report to Katliss. She will see you measured and fitted.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: I don't see a uniform. Report to Katliss. She will see you measured and fitted.

dialogue.name: KATLISS
dialogue.text: Ah, and there's the last of them! Your friends are being measured as we speak.

dialogue.name: KATLISS
dialogue.text: Right this way. We'll see to it you look your dashing best for your first outing!

dialogue.name: KATLISS
dialogue.text: Done, are you? Let's have a look at those numbers.

dialogue.name: KATLISS
dialogue.text: I see... Hmmm...

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: How goes it?

dialogue.name: KATLISS
dialogue.text: Sorry, Captain─I'm afraid we don't have anything on hand that's a ready fit.

dialogue.name: KATLISS
dialogue.text: But we do have a few that are fairly close. We should be able to make them work with some minor adjustments.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Very well, then. See to it. And have the uniforms delivered directly to the field.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: I shall take this opportunity to brief you on the mission.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: As mentioned earlier, we will deploy amaro to scatter dream powder from the air.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Once the powder takes effect, an elite unit will storm the fortress to rescue the Oracle. Her safe liberation is our sole objective; engagement is to be avoided wherever possible.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I assume we're to be part of said unit?

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Correct.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: The unit will be divided into two contingents, one deploying from Fort Jobb and the other from the Ostall Imperative. You and Alphinaud will join the former.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Forename, meanwhile, will join the latter with me.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Before you proceed to your positions, you are to report to Chessamile at Spagyrics.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: She will issue you with a serum to ward off the effects of dream powder.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We shall be on our way, then. Take care, my friend, and we will see you in the field.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: It's quite far to the Imperative, so you may make use of an amaro from the rookery. After you have collected the serum, of course.

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: Yes, sweetie? Is there something you need? ...Oh, one of the guard come for your dram, are you?

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: Here you go. A dose of this will keep you firmly in the waking world while your enemies are off in dreamland.

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: Now, if this is your first time, I should warn you: it's bitter as sin. Prince's kiss, they call it, but if you ask me, it should be crone's kiss! Hee hee!

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: Jests aside, the stuff really is foul. Most people gag like there's no tomorrow─but if you don't drain every last drop, you're liable to end up taking a trip to dreamland yourself. So I must ask you to drink it here and now, while I watch. Come on! Give the old crone a kiss, hee hee!

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: What are you waiting for, sweetie? Go on and give the old crone a kiss, hee hee!

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: (-Chessamile-)Well done, sweetie! I'm proud of you! Why, if I didn't know any better, I'd even say you enjoyed it! And now you needn't fear falling asleep on the battlefield. Just have care you don't lose any limbs out there, all right? They don't tend to grow back.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you are to avoid being forced to consume a second dose, you must drink the serum somewhere Chessamile can see you.

dialogue.name: CHESSAMILE
dialogue.text: Oh? You liked the taste so much, you want some more, is that it? Hee hee, you are a strange one! But as happy as I'd be to oblige, I'm afraid I must save some for the others. Run along now and see to the rest of your preparations!

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: Yes? What do you require of me?

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: An amaro to take you to the Imperative, eh?

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: As much as I would like to oblige, all our mounts are reserved for the coming operation. I fear you will have to go by foot.

dialogue.name: SZEMDJENMAI
dialogue.text: Hmmm, but wait. There might be another way, assuming you are willing to lend a hand.
